4318690.name: Battle Sages
4318690.description:
Battle Sages is a third-person wizard shooter strategy action RPG set within a formal arcane military program where recruits are forged into elite combat mages. You enter as a novice initiate and advance through structured training, live combat operations, and strategic deployments that test mastery of elemental power, tactical awareness, and battlefield discipline.

Players begin by choosing a primary elemental affinity — Arcane, Fire, Ice, or Electric — each defining combat style, strengths, and progression paths.

As of 2/25/2026 this game is stull under development.
